summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 759 m), feels like temperature (up 1.7°C), and inside temperature (up 1.8°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 739.3m higher than yesterday, 166.1m lower than the past week, 759.3m lower than the past month.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 765m and a peak of 2220m, averaging 2000m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.
cloud levels.summary: Expect mostly clear skies with high cloud.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; the temperature will feel pleasantly warm. Also, a muggy, humid atmosphere is likely. A few light raindrops may fall, mostly clear skies with high cloud, and very bright daylight. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
